igniteTNT.description: Toggle for igniting the tnt, similar to Fire Aspect behavior.

includeCustomTorch.description:
This makes custom torches that doesn't endswith: 
.*_torch or .*torch 
be included too.
List of included Custom Torch, since it only accepts any torches that endswith: *.torch or .*_torch 
Example: 
 - minecraft:torch
 - minecraft:soul_torch
 - minecraft:redstone_torch
 - any_custom:torch
 - any:_torch

excludeCustomTorch.description:
List of Custom or Vanilla torches to exclude.
Example: 
 - minecraft:soul_torch
 - .*_torch
 - any_custom:torch

prioritizeMainHand.description: Prioritize mainhand over offhand. If false, it will prioritize offhand over mainhand.

consumeTorchOnLit.description: Toggle for consuming the torch when lighting a campfire, candle or tnt.

torchFireEffects.description:
Map of torch effects to apply. 
(i.g Torch: 40 ticks, Soul Torch: 60 ticks)
